nodes.text: The Annecy sector was located in the Slice portion of the Expansion Region. By 0 ABY, it bordered the Dona Laza sector spinward and the Mid Rim's Lantillian and Terr'skiar sectors Rimward. The sector also formed a four-way border with the Biivren sector, the Couronne sector, and the Ghost Nebula at its trailing edge. The Annecy sector contained the New Raithal system, which in turn shared its name with the Colonies world Raithal.

The Annecy sector was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas. The sector was depicted on a map designed by Modi and published in the 2012 StarWars.com article "Essential Atlas Extra: Expansion Region."
